entry.title: Newsletter #74
entry.content:
Hi there! Here you go again with your weekly dose of #techthrusday !

Let’s welcome Nitesh Sharma to the tech team! (and Amin to photobombing :P )

Thanks to Oba that published a container to run the Akeneo PIM through docker a few days ago!
